Vigenère, Variant, Beaufort, Gronsfeld, Porta Assistant

Cipher Descriptions

VIGENÈRE (period times 10-15 lines deep)  |  VARIANT (period times 10-15 lines deep)  |  BEAUFORT (width of period times 10-15 lines deep)  |  GRONSFELD (period times 12-15 lines deep)  |  PORTA (period times 10-15 lines deep)
